features: FUN IN TRAVEL TIME: This is an adjustable car seat activity arch toy for babies and infants, vivid patterns, squeaky doll toys and mirror toy can keep babies’ attention, delight baby's mood, make travel time easier and more interesting.

EASY TO ATTACH: There is a buckle to connect this car seat toy and car seat, this car seat toy can be fixed on car seat stable and sturdy. OKOOKO car seat activity arch toy is made of non-toxic and skin-friendly fabric, soft and safe for baby.

SOFT SENSORY TOYS: OKOOKO car seat activity arch toy is designed in double-sided animal style, different animals on each side, 2 animal dolls which are soft and squeaky with teethers and also a soft mirror for babies to have reflection fun.

GREAT DEVELOPEMENT TOOL: Babies can develop their fine motor skills by grabbing, tugging and playing with this car seat activity arch toy, it can stimulate babies’ visual and aural senses, it will be a great start of baby early education!

PERFECT TRAVEL TOY: OKOOKO car seat toy perfectly fits for travel time, it can provide safe, fun, and stress-free car travel for families with babies. It comes with a delicate gift box, which makes it a nice choice for baby shower, birthday and Christmas.
body.description: Easy to install Buckle up It is easy to install on car headrests by the buckle on top. OKOOKO car seat toy can be fixed on car seat stable and sturdy. Adjustable hanging toys The height of toys on the arch bar can be fixed to suit baby's height through the buckle. Multiple uses Both the mirror and the plush toys can be detached and used separately. Not only can be hung on the baby's bed, but also on the stroller.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Fun in Travel Time! OKOOKO car seat activity arch toy is suitable for baby from 0 month above, it can attract baby's attention, relax baby's mood and anxiety in car on family trip. Baby can have more fun and comfort in travel time, and less bored.

OKOOKO car seat activity arch toy is designed to provide entertainment for baby when need to spend time in baby car seat. Two cute hanging soft toys encourage baby to develop auditory senses and tactile sensation. Soft mirror stimulates baby's visual senses, which is helpful for early education enlightenment. PS: Remember to tear the protective film on the mirror to get clear reflection.

Easy to install Buckle up It is easy to install on car headrests by the buckle on top. OKOOKO car seat toy can be fixed on car seat stable and sturdy. Adjustable hanging toys The height of toys on the arch bar can be fixed to suit baby's height through the buckle. Multiple uses Both the mirror and the plush toys can be detached and used separately. Not only can be hung on the baby's bed, but also on the stroller. Stimulate baby's senses Visual sense Auditory sense Tactile senses
Easy to install Double-sided Thick pad

Baby can grasp these toys to make squeaky sound and have fun, which can promote baby's tactile senses. Soft teether and rattle for baby to chew in teething period and grab. Please notice: There is a protective film on the soft mirror, tear off to get clear reflection. OKOOKO car seat activity arch toy is washable and tear-resistance, made of soft and non-toxic fabric,safe for baby.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great addition for traveling
reviews.reviewText: This product was easy to use. It is adjustable and snaps over a head rest. There are two sides so a child does not get bored. The hooks are versatile and I purchased additional toys that can attach for variety and change. It is also easy to adjust to the height needed for the age of the child.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun backseat option for baby
reviews.reviewText: Our little girl loves this! She can’t yet reach the toys but they give her something to look at and I love that if I flip it it could also be for a boy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: worked good for our long road trip! I bought this one because it’s the only one that seemed low enough for a baby in a car seat to actually reach. My daughter can reach it although it does take a bit of work but it gets the job done!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stops baby from throwing toys out of reach during car rides
reviews.reviewText: Stops baby from throwing toys out of reach during car rides and crying. Solves my problem of car toys getting taken into the house and then there's no toys in the car the next time we go in it. I just keep this in there all the time so there's always at least 3 toys in the car and there's always at least 3 things she can reach at all times while I drive. We have one in each vehicle now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Baby girl plays with this every single time we get in the car. Has made trips much easier!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Useless for rear-facing infant
reviews.reviewText: This is useless if your baby is rear-facing, which they should be if they are at an age when a toy of this type would interest them. We have a mid-size sedan and the Nuna Pipa car seat (rear-facing, as our baby is 3 months old) and the fit of the toy was an abject disaster. Not only was it completely incompatible with the baby mirror (we had to choose between the two, either the toy or the mirror), but the placement was so low that the bar and hanging toys just lay on baby’s lap. We removed it after having one good laugh about the poor design and we will be returning this. A shame because it’s cute and seems to be well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy set up and quick enjoyment
reviews.reviewText: Ordered for my 1 year old granddaughter. She loves it. Simple to set up and adjust. Quick shipping. It's a win/win

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really cute and keeps them busy
reviews.reviewText: This is really cute. Nice color easy to use and kids loves it.
Ideal for keeping babies busy who don't like car seats. My baby loved it a lot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a fabulous car toy. Keeps our grandson occupied- he loves the mirror. Very soft to the touch, no hard edges. It transports easily too.
Such a great idea! The quality could be better, as one of the toys is already falling off. Otherwise it works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my 6 month old who finds car journeys boring especially when no one is in the back with him, this has been great it keeps him calm and takes his mind off that no one is there. Plenty of giggles and shouting going on. Only downside is the strap needs to tightened regularly as it’s loosens on it own.
Now my 9 months old son enjoys in his car seat.he plays with this toy.
